content: हैमन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हेमंत एव हेमंते भवो वा अण् तलोपः] {@--1@} Wintry, cold; <ls>Śi. 6. 55</ls>, <ls>Ki. 17. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Pertaining to winter, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} long (as nights); <ls>Śi. 6. 77.</ls> {@--3@} Growing in or suitable for winter; हैमनैर्निवसनैः सुमध्यमाः <ls>R. 19. 41.</ls> {@--4@} Golden, made of gold. --नः {@--1@} The month Mārgaśīrsha. {@--2@} The winter season (= हेमंत <ab>q. v.</ab>).
